tool_description: Analyzes temporal patterns in sentiment data to identify trends, seasonal variations, and significant changes in customer sentiment over time.

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores for trend analysis

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps corresponding to sentiment scores

time_granularity.description: Time aggregation level: day, week, month, or quarter

trend_method.description: Trend analysis method: linear, polynomial, or moving_average

window_size.description: Moving average window size for smoothing (3-30)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: sentiment_scores and timestamps must have equal length.
Insufficient data points: Provide at least 10 data points for trend analysis.
Invalid time granularity: Use day, week, month, or quarter for time_granularity.
Unsupported trend method: Use linear, polynomial, or moving_average for trend_method.
Invalid window size: window_size must be between 3 and 30.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Trend calculation failed: Unable to compute trends with provided data.
usage: Provide sentiment scores with corresponding timestamps and configure temporal analysis parameters. The tool identifies sentiment trends and patterns over time.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, or stable

trend_points.description: Array of trend line values for visualization

change_points.description: Array of significant sentiment change timestamps

trend_summary.description: Summary of sentiment trends and temporal patterns
